法律を変える: (ほうりつをかえる) - to revise (amend) the law
法律事務所: (ほうりつじむしょ) - law office; law firm
法律問題: (ほうりつもんだい) - legal problem
法律学者: (ほうりつがくしゃ) - lawyer; jurist
法律用語: (ほうりつようご) - legal term; law term
法律相談: (ほうりつそうだん) - legal consultation; (giving) legal advice
法律相談所: (ほうりつそうだんしょ) - legal information center
法律違反: (ほうりついはん) - violation of the law
法性: (ほうしょう) - dharmata (dharma nature, the true nature of all manifest phenomena)
法改正: (ほうかいせい) - change in the law; legal reform
法改正案: (ほうかいせいあん) - law reform proposal; law reform bill
法政: (ほうせい) - law and politics; justice administration
法整備: (ほうせいび) - legislation; development of laws
法文: (ほうぶん) - text of the law
法文化: (ほうぶんか) - writing into law; codification; enacting
法文学部: (ほうぶんがくぶ) - faculty of law and literature
法服: (ほうふく) - robes of a judge or lawyer or priest
法案審議: (ほうあんしんぎ) - discussion; debate (on a piece of legislation)
法案提出: (ほうあんていしゅつ) - presentation of a draft bill (to parliament, diet, etc.)
法案提出断念: (ほうあんていしゅつだんねん) - withdrawal of proposed bill
法案提出権: (ほうあんていしゅつけん) - the right to submit a bill (draft law) to parliament
法楽: (ほうらく) - pleasures of a pious life
法治国家: (ほうちこっか) - country with a constitutional government; constitutional state; country where the rule of law prevails; system based on the rule of law
法界: (ほうかい) - universe; realm of thought; underlying principle of reality/manifestation of true thusness; (ほうかい only)   being jealous of things that have nothing to do with one/being jealous of others who are in love with each other
法界悋気: (ほうかいりんき) - (yoji) being jealous of things that have nothing to do with one; being jealous of others who are in love with each other
法界無縁: (ほっかいむえん) - all-encompassing mercy of the Buddha
法的保護: (ほうてきほご) - legal protection (e.g. of an environment or cultural asset)
法的手段: (ほうてきしゅだん) - legal means; legal methods; legal measures
法的拘束力: (ほうてきこうそくりょく) - {law} legal binding force; legally binding power
法的整理: (ほうてきせいり) - legal liquidation; court-mediated winding-up of a company
法的文書: (ほうてきぶんしょ) - legal document
法的根拠: (ほうてきこんきょ) - legal basis
法皇: (ほうおう) - ex-emperor who becomes a monk; (Catholic) Pope/religious leader
法益: (ほうえき) - benefit and protection of the law; interests protected by law; legal benefit
法相: (ほっそう) - dharmalaksana (dharma characteristics, the specific characteristics of all manifest phenomena); Hosso sect of Buddhism
法相宗: (ほうそうしゅう) - Hosso sect of Buddhism (Japanese equivalent of the Chinese Faxiang sect)
法眼: (ほうげん) - the dharma eye; second highest priestly rank in Buddhism; title bestowed upon doctors, etc.
法社会学: (ほうしゃかいがく) - sociology of law
法科大学院: (ほうかだいがくいん) - law school
法竹: (ほっちく) - type of open-ended bamboo flute
法網: (ほうもう) - net of the law; justice
法線ベクトル: (ほうせんベクトル) - normal vector
法華: (ほけ) - Nichiren sect/Tendai sect; Lotus Sutra
法華八講: (ほっけはっこう) - Buddhist service in which the eight scrolls of the Lotus Sutra are read one scroll at a time (one morning and one evening reading each day for four days with a different reciter each time)
法華宗: (ほっけしゅう) - Nichiren sect of Buddhism (sometimes specifically referring to the Hokke school of Nichiren); Tendai sect of Buddhism
法華神道: (ほっけしんとう) - Hokke Shinto (Shinto doctrines based on Nichiren Buddhism)
法蔵: (ほうぞう) - Buddhist teachings/Buddhist scriptures; Dharmakara/Amitabha Buddha in a pre-enlightenment incarnation
法蔵比丘: (ほうぞうびく) - Dharmakara Bodhisattva; Amitabha Buddha in a pre-enlightenment incarnation
法螺を吹く: (ほらをふく) - to boast; to brag
法螺話: (ほらばなし) - tall story; cock-and-bull story
法螺貝: (ホラガイ) - conch (Charonia tritonis); trumpet shell
法術: (ほうじゅつ) - practising law; legal processes in running a country; method/way/means; magic
法被: (はっぴ) - happi coat (happy coat); workman's livery coat
法規: (ほうき) - the law; laws and regulations
法規範: (ほうきはん) - legal norm; legal standard
法解釈学: (ほうかいしゃくがく) - legal hermeneutics
